import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { fetchStudentById, putStudentInDatabase } from "../../services/studentServices" export const EditStudent = () => { const [editStudent, setEditStudent] = useState({}) const navigate = useNavigate() const { studentId } = useParams() const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchStudentById(studentId).then((data) => { setEditStudent(data) }) } const handleInput = (event) => { const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value const copy = { ...editStudent } copy[name] = value console.log("copy", copy) setEditStudent(copy) } const handleUpdate = (event) => { event.preventDefault() putStudentInDatabase(editStudent).then(() => { navigate('/students') }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [studentId]) return (

Edit Student

) }
